name: C47 & MOU5
description:
C47 & MOU5

Play as MOU5 a small robot that because of its firmware can't attack or break out of its pacifism code. You must manipulate the warden robot C47 to help you escape the complex, by bashing through doors and blowing up generators. You must be careful to not get too close too C47 or be hit by its missile attacks as he is not the friendly type.

In order to escape you must collect enough keys (5/11) to unlock the golden door at the end.

Controls:

  •  WASD -->  Movement 
  •  Mouse -->  Camera Control 
  •  Left Click  --> Taunt, this baits a charge attack from the C47, this charge attack can be used to bash through doors
  •  Right Click --> Flare, tricks the C47 into shooting a rocket, this can be used to destroy door generators

Created in 3 days for WowieJam 4
